titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in "In re Sealed Case".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in In re Sealed Case in support of the constitutionality of Title VI of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (concerning the appointment, duties, and removal of independent counsels).
